overview: Illegal traffic of fur is always bustling and profit from protected animals exceeds expectations. Four hunters set off for a hunt hoping to return with the great grey wolf’s fur. During the hunt, one of the hunters is accidentally hit by a shot and is badly hurt. The others, fearing the consequences of helping him, decide to abandon him and never to speak of it with anybody. The wolf decides to bring him to his cave. This story is about a man confronting the beast. He’ll learn his true nature, finding the true meaning of loyalty and respect during his last days.
title: Sell Your Skin Dearly
